title: Patch failed and we dont sure why
body:
Hi, guys have you ever meet the problem of 'Patch failed and we dont sure why'.

My PC is windows 10 system, I almost tried every method that online said, e.g., using administrator boot, hextech repair tool, delete config or client update as well as re-installed game.

 I even re-installed windows 10 system, however, not worked at all.

However, when I changed the region to North America,  the patch is succeed.

How to solve this problem? Is that riot's problem? Like OCE serve screwed?

replies.body:
Hi, Guys,

It seems the only way to fix this problem is trying to find your friends and get a copy of a well-downloaded game.

That's how I solved it.

Hey guys, 

I have the same issue and have worked through riot support.
Are you guys on Optus as well?
Would appreciate a fix for this as I am also encountering the exact same problem that seems to be OCE server specific.

Your best bet is probably going to be to submit a ticket to player support detailing the issue (with screenshots where possible) and what you've already done to try and fix it. They can most likely help you more than anyone active here can now.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
